'''Nirro, Canta Nicese''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Count of Nicese is the political head of the Vailian Trading Company, keen on flaunting his affluence with fine garb, gembs, and honeyed words. Although both the Director and the Governor of the company answer to him, he is preoccupied with the constant bickering with [Rauatai](/rauatai/) and the RDC in front of the Queen, leaving management affairs in their capable hands. His latest problem is the accusation by [Hazanui Karū](/hazanuiKaru/) that the Vailian Trading Company deliberately engineered a storm to wreak havoc on Rauataian holdings at [Hasongo](/hasongo/) while sparing their own.

}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Vote of No Confidence](/aVoteOfNoConfidence/): The Canta leads the proceedings during the trial of Director Castol.
*[The City Lost to Time](/theCityLostToTime/): Nirro will be leading a group of VTC soldiers on their last effort to take you down.
